        public void setupHTMLGeneratorTest()
                            throws NullPositionException
        Initialises a Player and defines a path on the map, before every unit test.
        Throws:
        NullPositionException - is thrown whenever the start_position is not set (unexpected).

        Tests whether the same instance is returned when attempting to create a new instance (i.e. testing the singleton pattern).
